name: Andy's journey
description:
a new platform game in hardcore version with tricky traps that make the game difficult to complete.

This project is part of the summer university module of the 4th semester of computer science at HEPIA and is carried out by Thomas Dagier and Dorian Bernasconi.

This game is for all types of players who are looking for a challenge and who are not afraid of breaking a screen or two.

You can play a demo here : https://another-game-d208c.web.app/
